qualifications.item: Extensive real-world customer experiences in enterprise architecture and global infrastructures.
Creative problem solver with know how to get things done and ability to lead others to success.
Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to develop easy rapport with others while building trust.
Success driven, passionate, and committed to excellence, high standards, and customer satisfaction.

work.item: Built criteria used by WideNarrow platform to automatically extract news from different sources and transform them into RSS feeds, making it easy for CI team to consume and publish on Google Workspace.
Leveraged Microsoft O365 to create a personalized CRM with SMEs and established automatic cadence in order build positioning against competitors.
Scripted Google Slide API to automatically generate PPT presentations with updated materials at internal team's request.
Built a Power Automate bot to disseminate intelligence over Slack, Microsoft Sharepoint and Teams.
Pioneered Appliances, cgroups, Mac OS notarization, SAML, BitLocker, Integrity Monitoring, REST token lifecycle with customers, and created documentation on implementation.
Interfaced with user experience designers and other developers to ensure thoughtful and coherent user experiences.
Tested site in various browsers and devices to ensure cross-browser compatibility and accessibility.
Proposed and implemented scalable solutions to issues identified with customers and applications responsible for communicating with Tanium.
Delivered on SOWs around 5G, IPv6, SCCM, GPO, Munki, NSIS, Casper (JAMF), Meraki, KACE, Ivanti, VMware, AWS, Ansible, Terraform, Jenkins, Symantec.
Write modern, performant, and robust code for a diverse array of client and internal projects.
Monitored cloud and appliances using observability tools such as Zabbix.
Deep log dives using grep, sed, awk to quickly get to RCA.
Engineered and maintained major features of Evergreen's CRM using Lotus Notes 8, LotusScript, DB2, SQL, and CSS
Architected and implemented custom front-end to USMT, which lets deskside reps perform account migrations over the network.
Supported Lenovo, Dells, ManageNow, and executives.
Completed Install, Move, Add, Change according to RFPs.
Work with a variety of different languages, frameworks, and content management systems such as JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PHP, jQuery, CodeIgniter, ASP.NET, SQL, etc.
Developed and shipped interactive web application for dormitory walkthrough.

education.degree: 110 Credits, Bachelor of Arts, Computer Science
education.name: Metropolitan State University
